testcase.name: Given User is on Amazon page https://www.amazon.com
When User searches for Nikon, sort the filter from highest to Lowest
And User clicks on second product
Then Verify the product name as Nikon D3X

failure.message: Second Product name mismatched, actual is Nikon D850 FX-Format Digital SLR Camera with Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 500mm f/5.6E PF ED VR Super-Telephoto Lens

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: Second Product name mismatched, actual is Nikon D850 FX-Format Digital SLR Camera with Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 500mm f/5.6E PF ED VR Super-Telephoto Lens at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:41) at stepDefs.stepDefinition.verifyProductName(stepDefinition.java:54) at ✽.Then Verify the product name as Nikon D3X(src/test/java/features/AmazonSearchProduct.feature:7)
testcase.system-out: Nikon D850 FX-Format Digital SLR Camera with Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 500mm f/5.6E PF ED VR Super-Telephoto Lens Nikon D3X
